channel.title: Help making admins in testscape
channel.description:
Ok testscape isn't like basic whitescape where you go into characters and change player rights to 3 or 2... No this 1 loads out of savedgames and idk how to change player rights on those because there .dat file... Help please! Tried opening the .dat in notebook and it came up really weird and can't read it.... or understand it.
Help and get ++rep!
:)

item.title: Help making admins in testscape
item.dc:creator: @mopar_user mopar user
item.description:
@mopar_user wrote:

Thank you ++rep!

Read full topic

item.title: Help making admins in testscape
item.dc:creator: @PussyCrunch PussyCrunch
item.description:
@PussyCrunch wrote:

Open your client.java and search

admin list

Then you will see (“username”) and the playerRights right next to it. Change the username to w/e username you want to have the certain amount of player rights.

It won’t actually say (“username”) it would say something like…(“nvi ible”) and then it would have playerRights 3 next to it. Change the nvi ible to your desired username, and whatever one you picked will be a administrator.

Sorry if that came out a little confusing.

Read full topic
